ca.mcgill.ecse211.liberty

Class UltrasonicLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.liberty.UltrasonicLocalizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    functionProvider

    public class UltrasonicLocalizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements functionProvider
    This class will perform the ultrasonic localization using either - the rising edge routine or, - the falling edge routine.

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double theta)
        This method determines at which angle the robot should go to. It should do so with a MINIMAL angle.
        Parameters:
        theta - if positive then the robot will turn to the right, else it will rotate the the left
